TY for the vibrator link. You're right, these are quite pricey, but due to the construction, material and overall quality. They're much too smooth to be functional, I think. The upside is, they'll probably come out easy if accidentally, erm..... swallowed. I'm staggered there are not more double-action ones. I think you're missing out with single action, yet majority sold are. Want to know something funny? The pricey ones are usually made from companies that care about image more than content, so the lesser name brands are more likley to stock more "functional" ones. But if you're buying, I guess it's your choice.

BUt my question for here is: what does your average looking drug dealer look like?
Depends what they sell, stereotypes are everywhere. but you get the home dealers that are fat and geeky. The dealers that do it to feed the habit, that look surprisingly run down and drug addicted. You get the ones that do it for the cash and they tend to look flash and drive around in their fancy cars, then you get dealers like me ;)
Ace

Are you a virgin, or abstaining?
I gotta say, everyone abstains until they lose their virginity, and I don't know any virgin supermen.
I mean, I remember being a virgin, and it didn't give me any superpowers.  Fucking does though.
I am a super fucker.
Last Saturday night I came about 8 or 9 times... try that virgin.
The next day, I felt great.
If there was any scientific proof to your claim, athletes the world over would stay virgins for the big bucks.
Some do abstain before a match, but I think it's more mental than physical, testosterone levels after an orgasm take about a week to spike again, but you can do it several time every day without detriment to your ability to move around.
Having an orgasm makes you feel a little weak in the knees for a very short time, I would say any drug you buy here would do more to your body than getting your freak on.
Looking back through your posts joywind, I see you have an unhealthy hatred of women. I think it's best for everyone if you just don't go near them at all. Maybe see a shrink, or drop some acid.

Quote from: TrashBox on January 10, 2013, 05:30 pm
Thanks for the advice, Prin! You're right, I generally smoke sativa dom strains. Right now I have purple diesel, actually, which is a pretty energetic high. Not sure why I hadnt thought of chamomile tea, I drink that before bed all the time! I've never tried Melatonin, I'll have to do some research. I tryyyyyyyy to stay away from pharmies but if I had one the other night/morning I would have taken it!! Maybe I'll get a few just to keep on hand for emergencies.
Rest assured you'll be fine with melatonin, it's a natural hormone that's part of our natural sleep wake cycle, if you wish to do some research the sleepfoundation is a good place to start (clearwebalert) http://www.sleepfoundation.org/article/sleep-topics/melatonin-and-sleep I swear by swanson's triple strength (clearwebalert) http://www.swansonvitamins.com/swanson-ultra-triple-strength-melatonin-10-mg-60-caps?csi=SW502&csp=SWU305 there's lots of honest reviews there too, it's brilliant and super reasonable, I can't recommend it enough for a peaceful post sesh sleep. In terms of greenery your best avoiding the sativa strains as they're uplifting, when you're already high it defeats the object of coming down, you definitely need a heavy indica to help you drift off into calm and relaxation strains like grand daddy purple and blueberry kush are brilliant for this but any heavy indica should do wonders, and don't forget to have some chamomile tea to hand. I agree with you hun I try to avoid pharmies too, the natural approach is definitely the way forward :)

Title: Re: I fantasize about having sex with you people
Post by: DiamondSky on January 13, 2013, 09:30 pm
So I'm a writer which by default means I'm one of those lame ass douche bags that likes to go to Starbucks with my notebook and write in public. One of my favorite things to do when I hit a blank spot is to look around and fall in love with some girl there. I guess I just have an active imagination or something but it is so nice to just build a story around a stranger and imagine how the two of you could be together. I never say anything, I don't leer at them salvatiously, I just take a quick look and fill my mind with why they are there, what they are thinking. I imagine their vulnerabilities and how I could complement them with my strengths.

Every now and then a conversation will take place and some flirting will be done but oddly enough I find the fantasy of falling in love for an instant more rewarding than taking a stranger home to be bedded. Talking someone out of their clothes has never been especially difficult for me but if I consummate the dream than all I'm left with is a reality that pales to my voyeuristic imagination.

But Judge Judy? She would be a tough one for me to fall in love with, even for a moment...

Title: Re: I fantasize about having sex with you people
Post by: DiamondSky on January 16, 2013, 05:39 am
All right... I've had to live with the curse of being a genius my entire life... I carry my intellect around like a heavy ball and chain... I'm constantly faced with one brilliant idea after another:

Open a tattoo shop just for pets.
Give religious people drugs so that when they talk to god he can talk back.
Combat global warming by having everyone turn their AC on high and open all their windows.

Yeah, needless to say I'm a sharp cookie. Just now though, I realized what TOR really needs. The thing that would make the anonymous internet way more personal and real... it needs:

Second Life for TOR.

If you haven't experienced Second Life before it's a place where people that hate their first life can go and hide in a virtual world in which they can create 3D avatars that they use to interact with other people running the same software. PrinchessHIGH could be a goddess atop her mountain, Razorspyne could have his own virtual porn studio, TrashBox could tease us with her frisky hobbies and we could all walk down the Silk Road holding hands as we listened to some Floyd and got a little high.

Imagine the joy of meeting your vendors face to virtual face! Think of the possibilities as hundreds of drug users craft a world to their desire. Self Exploding police stations. Chocolate Chip Mountains. The fastest mode of travel could be by Yellow Submarines.

Just need to find some programers, several millions of dollars and a few years to make it all happen!

Invite friends.
Insert drugs.
Turn the heat up about 10 degrees.
Play the lotion game.

Rules of the lotion game are simple, host applies lotion to a guest's hands and tells them they need to rub it on a friend to get rid of it.

If you adhere to the steps above and people are not naked within 1.5 hours of inserting drugs you can contact me for a full refund.

To do the quote thing Raz uses is as simple as clicking the "quote" button (it's the second icon in from the left sitting above all the emoticons (faces). You should then see 2 x the word quote with brackets around it - [/quote]. Just click in between the two words, quote, and hit the space bar a couple of times to make some room between them. Then just paste any comment between the two "quotes" and it will look like a post by Raz when you post it.  :)

Quote from: Wadozo on January 19, 2013, 02:23 am
To do the quote thing Raz uses is as simple as clicking the "quote" button (it's the second icon in from the left sitting above all the emoticons (faces). You should then see 2 x the word quote with brackets around it - "
". Just click in between the two words, quote, and hit the space bar a couple of times to make some room between them. Then just paste any comment between the two "quotes" and it will look like a post by Raz when you post it.  :)
[/quote]

I wonder if it would be possible to design a "Vibe Server" over tor using open source protocols?

Consider this. You would take standard egg-shaped bullet vibes, and connect them to a DIY USB interface, and you connect over Tor to a modified Jabber server using free and open source client software. You connect to a vibrator session using an extended but well-documented Jingle protocol that makes use of Tor Hidden Services similar to Torchat, and can thereby send literal "positive vibes" to people over the Internet via Tor.

That sounds like a really fun project, actually.

I could do it all in Python.

Github does not seem to block tor exit nodes, so we could register an account on Github, and begin a FOSS repository there.

Anyone interested in assisting me with this?

If clearnet Github is unsatisfactory, give me a few months, and I'll host my own gitweb server (similar to Gitorious) over Tor, which makes it 100% Darknet.

Anyone interested?

I could set up a chain of deals with known and trusted vendors to sell plenty of egg-shaped bullet vibes and pre-constructed USB interfaces for them.

Anyone interested in this?

Title: Re: I fantasize about having sex with you people
Post by: DiamondSky on January 27, 2013, 08:52 pm
So the weirdest sexual thing that's happened with me lately is I keep having it with my girlfriend.

Normally we are sex camels... we love each other and all but the actual sex doesn't normally happen all that often.

Ever since we started doing drugs together we talk all the time, say nice things about each other and then end up shagging like mad for weeks after the high is gone.

The other day I was watching a little porn, getting myself off as usual... and all of the sudden I started thinking about my girlfriend.

I mean I've lived my whole life hearing drugs are bad and all but I never really believed it until that moment. My girlfriend has become my sexual fantasy. I eat her out for hours on end. I do the dishes for her so she can just come home and relax after working all day. She comes in when I'm working and I stop what I'm doing and look at her with loving appreciation.

I think no one really appreciates that if we take these drugs and have our good times that there are going to be consequences but I am living proof. So next time you are sitting around with a pill to pop or a line to snort you really should ask yourself "Do I want to risk being more open and happy with the person I am going to share this experience with? Do I want to find myself liking someone more just because of the fact that our shared drug use allows us to explore new and fascinating aspects of each other that might lead to increased bonding?"

Sure, drugs sound like a lot of fun at first but eventually you have to start dealing with the consequences...

i'll be the bigger random anonomous online personality and say 'let's not'..

fine.. you twisted my third arm!!
grab some duct tape, super glue, shrooms, a handful of coke, a fistful of vasoline and let's get this party started!!

Title: Re: I fantasize about having sex with you people
Post by: DiamondSky on January 31, 2013, 09:32 pm
All right TrashBox, here's my official guide to drugging friends:

1. Tell everyone that they are going to love the drug.
2. Let everyone know that sometimes on the come up or down people can get a little nauseous and that's okay. After a quick purge life will be fine.
3. Let everyone know that sometimes on the come up or down people can get a little sweaty and that's okay. This normally comes right before the nauseous and having a cool room / spot helps a lot.
4. Try to encourage everyone to skip dinner if they can and dose at the same time. Part of the fun with E is having everyone in the same place at the same time and an empty stomach helps.
5. I wouldn't worry too much about varying the dose by weight / sex. I know it's counter intuitive but it's been my experience that most people roll pretty good the first time off 120-150mg regardless of size.
6. If the space accommodates it, have a room with some music and a quiet room. Some people love music when high and for others it can be a little overwhelming.
7. Figure out a bump strategy in advance. Almost every issue people have with MDMA comes from badly planed bumps. The general rule is 50% dose at one hour in. My girlfriend and I often do full redose at about 1.5 - 2 hours. YMMV.
8. Weed is great but I would avoid it during the roll and just use some for the come down. MDMA is a beautiful drug and if it's their first time you should just let them roll pure and clean. This means keep the booze hidden too until later at least!
9. The more toys the better. I love those little spider head massagers on E. Vic's is pretty awesome. Lotion as mentioned before. Bath time is especially nice too but it's gonna be hard to get people out once they get in.
10. Not to be a total downer but if at all possible it would be nice if there was one person at the party that could stay sober and mostly out of the way. Giving a bunch of friends drugs is awesome fun but people are stupid on drugs and if anyone has any problems it's nice to have a lifeline to get a little help. Never been an issue, probably never will be, but you know where I'm coming from.

Other than that have fun. I saw you asked about lithium in another thread which is important. I ALWAYS make sure no one is on SSRI's too which is a bitch because people don't like to admit to them. The good news is the anti-depresent folks won't die or anything, they just won't roll very hard if at all.

Make sure to let us know how it goes. We're going to need all the details since we are living vicariously through you!

Title: Re: I fantasize about having sex with you people
Post by: DiamondSky on February 01, 2013, 03:57 am
We're here for you. I have girlfriend that I really want to have come over and drop E with my girl and I but she is totally scared of the stuff. The war on drugs is already stupid enough but when it starts getting in the way of my drug induced threesomes it really aggravates me!

I think anyone who could live one minute on a roll would immediately sign up for the other couple of hours but talking them into it can be a pain with all the crap they have heard. Maybe just take him aside, look him in the eyes and say "If you don't do this everyone is going to think you are really, really gay." Peer pressure and drugs have a long relationship with each other.

Oh, totally forgot the one other thing for the party roll, get some Magnesium Chelate if you can. I never get the clenchies but my girl gets them like mad when we drop. The regular magnesium sucks but for some reason the  magnesium chelate takes the jaw tension down by a huge factor. I had to go to the Vitamin Shoppe to get some, GNC and WalGreens just had magnesium oxide which wasn't great. Like $6 bucks for a bottle and might keep a few people from loving life while they eat their face off.

Title: Re: I fantasize about having sex with you people
Post by: TrashBox on February 04, 2013, 07:06 pm
CJ, it reasonates in all the right places... My favorite part: you whimper that it's too big and get spanked until you're wet  :-X

My parrrrty :)
It turned out to be 3 females and 6 males. About 30 minutes in everyone started to feel it so I quickly changed the music, turned on the disco light and cleared off the countertop for dancing :)
We probably did that for about an hour then the girls decided they wanted to "play dress-up". So the three of us dipped into my Vegas dress stash and piled on the make-up and jewelry. We marched back into the party and the guys were so excited. I thought it was hilarious how in awe they were of us. One guy kept telling me " this is the best party I have ever been to. You arw Aphrodite". I thought that was the best compliment ever and briefly considered a career in mdma-fueled couples counseling (I know, not a super original thought) anyway... The boys were so enthralled that they allowed us to dress them!! They squeezed into some of my lingerie and skankiest clothes. It was hilarious. I haven't laughed that hard in a long time.
Next we redosed. I had only planned on a couple of us redosing since it was most everyone's first experience, but we were in a moment and wanted to prolong the magic :)
Next we (the girls) started rubbing lotion on each other's arms and talked about sitting by the hookah and making out... I swear at that exact moment the other girl started to feel nauseous and so the 3 of us retired to the bathroom for the rest of the night. We were jUst hanging and cuddling and talking and playing with eatchorher's hair, but we were in there for hours!!! Finally one of the guys came to get us...  after talking to the guys about it later I realized we totally left them high and dry LOL
At that point the drugs had sorta worn off and it was late so everyone went home.

I have heard from everyone since that they can't wait for the next one :)

Congrats! That nauseous thing sucks a little but the best part about E is it normally doesn't bother the person feeling it too much. It's pretty well super hard / impossible to have MDMA on hand and not want to redose to prolong the magic though. Now that you are getting them all turned on to the MDMA train though you can chat with those that had a tummy issue and see if they want to try plugging it next time. My girl gets queasy more than I do but has never gotten so on plugging. If it was mostly the girls I think it would be an easy sell.

I think you're all set for the next go around. Maybe you can make it a monthly / bimonthly thing for a while. You just always have to make sure to have more new folks come over... that shared high from people's first time is just fucking incredible.

Hopefully you got to make out with someone at least a little. I swear there really isn't much better in the world then making out on E. It's like what every kiss ever wants to be but just can't quite get to.

I'm just four days away from my Drugimoon now... I've got some MDMA, Moxy, MDA, Acid, Shrooms, GHB, Good Pot and Xanax in my supply kit. Going to try the Moxy first since it's supposed to be a little more erotic than the rest and go from there. Doubt we'll do anywhere near all of the stuff but figure we have enough to mix and match as the mood fits. 

If I don't post anything after Friday just know, we went out doing what we love!

That sort of sucks having a non-awesome person there. Some people just don't get the vibe even when it's medically installed in them. My favorite part of an MDMA roll is that everyone just sort of gets everyone else. It's fun to chase with some 2CB on the tail end for the visuals because the empathy is still there but you get some crazy shit happening visually. Me and my girl were watching The Incredibles on a 2CB chaser and it's fun to share those connections where you're like "What the fuck is happening on the screen?" and we both just break up laughing.

By the way, can I just give a big shout out to Pixar for basically being in the business of creating movies that are awesome to watch while on drugs?

Maybe to mix it up next time you try it start off with the MDMA and then chase with MDA when you all are ready for a bump and see how that goes. I love the visuals on MDMA, gets me the eye wiggles like nothing else can but it is way harder on the come up so the queasy need to be careful. If you get rid of the loosers and keep the fun people you could end up being the Goddess of Parties for everyone in town!

Separate note, just tried Moxy for the first time the other night (I like to test stuff before I put it in my girlfriend, have issues with poisoning her and all), and it's a different sort of trip you might want to check out sometime for a little bedroom fun. 6-8mg gets a nice little body buzz and it's real easy to find reasons to get horny. Not to get to painfully graphic but I got off about 5 times in a couple of hours on the stuff so... yeah, it's kind of neat. It's got a bit of a stim load to it, can feel it in your chest a little, but nothing overwhelming. I know you like new adventures so just thought I'd toss it out there for you. Higher doses get visual which you might like but the low doses are like a little tickle in the crotch while staying in pretty good control of things.

Quote from: DiamondSky on February 06, 2013, 10:59 pm
Higher doses get visual which you might like but the low doses are like a little tickle in the crotch while staying in pretty good control of things.

This is good to know.

Yeah I feel like I should have chosen the screen mane  "MrPlugs" for all the talking I do about it but people probably would have just thought I was a bald guy with pubic hair stapled to my forehead. Seems weird though to be on a drug forum where people will talk about super heating a glass tube to hotrail meth into their brain but essentially taking a suppository is still taboo. The one thing I have noticed is that 90% of the people are offended by the entire concept.... until they try it and then they are like, fuck, that was easy and I'm really freaking high now.

Have fun with the Moxy. Not that it's the best way to go about doing things but the dose curve on the stuff is really sharp so you want to be careful. My scale and I still haven't come to terms with .001 measurements even though it's supposed to be great at it so I've been using a 1-3 mg scoop (think plastic spoon with a VERY tiny scoop at the end). If you are going to be feeling it out try to get to about 6mg and hang out there for at least an hour before you bump 2-4mg more. By the end of my trials I had taken in about 15mg and things had started getting a little visual but only just slightly. It makes me think my go to dose would be about 10-12mg by the time I factor in the halflife of my previous doses over the hours I played with it.

I had a good holiday, didn't have any sexy shenanigans, it was more about me sitting high on top of a mountain, reflecting and meditating, I did get drunk quite a few times too and almost drove off a cliff one night, fortunately I'm real good at three point turns in tight places! I've learnt my lesson never drive through nature trails in foreign countries in the dark, it doesn't end well! Title: Re: I fantasize about having sex with you people
Post by: raynardine on February 10, 2013, 07:12 pm
Quote from: purplelotus on February 10, 2013, 05:44 am
Don't fuck either of those fags... Jesus man, you need a girl who you can be rough and dominant with.. otherwise that makes you a fag. Fucking a dude or fucking a girl who is more aggressive and dominant than you, well both of those make you a complete homosexual.

Not sure if serious....

First of all, the concept of there being a very clear boolean true/false value for "homosexual/not-homosexual" is a very very flawed concept, and does not correlate with reality.

The truth is, the vast majority of the biggest pseudo-masculine personas out there are lying to themselves and others and trying to hide their love of the cock.

Secondly, gender (and orientation, which relies on a concept of gender) is very very fluid, and usually preferences turn out to rely on things unrelated to sex or gender.

For example, many guys love jiggling boobies. The more jiggly and round, the better. Some like nestling into them like a huge comfortable pillow, or suckling the nipples. Freud would have entire dissertations to say on that subject if he had lived long enough to get around to it.

Thirdly, all people who live in industrialized nations have had things like tubes and thermometers shoved up their butts, even if they were too young to remember it. The frantic rejection to the concept of plugging is very silly, because all it does is highlight how insecure they are. Real men plug.

Fourthly, people who inject drugs directly into their veins, and spend all that money on needles, rubber bands, cotton balls, and bandages are being ridiculous, when you can plug for a tiny fraction of the cost, for a tiny penalty of at most 2% less bioavailabiltiy. If you really want to spend that much on a slightly faster comeup, that's fine, but if it's an argument based on bioavailability, the cost-effectiveness is clearly in favor of plugging.

On the subject of dominance and submission determining your gender, I've been advocating a long time for the abolishment of gender stereotypes, and using dominance and submission as the new social roles to replace gender. You can be male, or female, but whether you are dominant or submissive is a completely separate variable.

Submissive males are very common in reality, and a lot of times, unless you are extremely submissive, or extremely dominant, it simply doesn't outwardly show until you slam a submissive against a wall and grope them. If they whimper and bare their neck, without making any move to stop you from groping them, that gives you an answer.

If you try to slam someone against a wall, and end up getting pinned down yourself, that also gives you an answer.

The times are changing, and many false assumptions about the reality of human nature, and people who seek the truth and reveal it are discarding the cultural mores and social norms forced down upon us from the self-hating elites who own us.

One day, with the aid of onion routing, decentralized digital currencies, private information retrieval, assassination markets, black stock markets, entire cultures and economies completely independent and liberated from the elites' hegemony over us will destroy gender stereotypes, perhaps even discarding the concept of gender completely.

This is a day to which I am looking forward.

I would prefer being one out of a hundred dudes after a girl online, than to be one out of 5 dudes after a girl in a bar. About three months ago, when I was actively online dating... I decided to try to see how many different women I could have sex with in a row, a different one each day. I reached 7 before finally my body demanded a break. During this period of time, while I was online, it was pretty much unheard of for me not to have sex 6 or 7 nights a week. Now that I'm offline, I haven't had sex in a couple weeks... if that sounds bipolar to you, well it is! The good news is, I'm about to go back on the ride up! YIPEE!!!

It doesn't count as, "in a row", if you didn't go straight from the first girl's apartment to meeting the next girl. =p
I went three in a row before utter exhaustion. I was afraid I'd pass out on the drive home. I like girls from the big city, but I don't live there.

So its a LONG fucking drive for me to get tail. Are you a city dweller yourself? I do online dating too, for when I'm not in the mood for a party or event. Girls have apartments (and cute roommates... ;3). One offered me use of her apartment as a Base 'o Operations for extending missions of debauchery... But I turned her down. I regret that so much, to this day.


Do you use any drugs to keep up your stamina? I usually have my ladies do all the work, as I get tired smoker-lungs easy. Pot gets me in the mood easier, but it doesn't give me any extra oomf when the girly wants me on top and pounding her.

Title: Re: I fantasize about having sex with you people
Post by: purplelotus on February 12, 2013, 05:03 am
It's a substance used to reduce prolactin, which in women enhances breast tissue production and is naturally produced, so it is used for women with breast cancer to reduce the growth of any breast tissue including the cancer. In Men, prolactin is the chemical released when you have an orgasm that makes you flaccid after you orgasm.  So by eliminating prolactin, you can eliminate the flaccid effect that comes (cums) with an orgasm.

Warning: You will terrify your peers with the sheer volume of your projectile semen ejaculation.

It's only one month away from completion. I'm still deciding whether to sell the finished blend for profit, or to just publish the recipe  here for all your sexual torture needs.

Second Warning: The blend will prevent you from achieving orgasm for days before releasing it all at once in an intimidatingly impressive fountain. You need to set a few days aside for torturing your partner or yourself.

This blend will work on males or females, although originally intended for males, it will cause any intact female to squirt uncontrollably during the later phases of the drug blend's metabolism.

Third Warning: If you have a weak mind, do not attempt using this blend. Your mind will be rent asunder.

Fourth Warning: Do not attempt dosing more than the recommended dosing regimen. If you overdose on this blend, you will die convulsing in a pool of your own sexual juices. Imagine what the team sent to clean up your dead body will think when they realize that huge pool of sexual discharge is actually yours.

Title: Re: I fantasize about having sex with you people
Post by: DiamondSky on February 17, 2013, 10:00 pm
Well, you all know I like to talk about drugs and sex so what better place to drop this than here.

Got a couple hits of acid in the mail the other day. Being a responsible drug user I waited almost 2 full days before my wife had a day off work so we could take them. Inserted the tabs under the tongue, waited 20 minutes or so and swallowed em up. Not much of a come up, a few giggles but the world was still fundamentally grounded in the reality we are accustomed to. After 1.5 hours, she got up to go to the bathroom, I grabbed some MDMA, tossed it in her mouth and after she swallowed she was all "What was that?" God I love my girl. We decided to smoke a few bowls after which I proudly proclaimed "Now we are on three kinds of drugs!". The pot really helped up the general high we are getting to.

About 45-60 minutes after the MDMA I started kissing on her back for a while which elicited whimper and moans followed by the words "Every kiss was like a little orgasm." Unlike a pure MDMA roll, my little guy was up for some playtime and we proceeded to get down with the maritals for a while which left us both rather satisfied. One more MDMA drop, an hour of kissing and touching and moaning along with quite a bit more pot which really seemed to help with this combo. We decided that the trip wasn't too visual which was a little sad for us, fortunately with a giant bag of drugs a cure was not too hard to find and we dropped about 35mg of Moxy into the mix.

Now by this point my girl was starting to get a little tired so after flipping through some old pictures and letters together we eventually ended up snuggled in bed and watched some movies for a bit. I think this might be a uniquely Moxy related thing but the people on the TV seemed to have forgotten how to speak English. I could tell they were really trying hard but all I could hear were these low muffled sounds in place of the words most actors normally use. Eventually we opened the bag of drugs again and popped a little Xanax powder to lull our brains off to sleep and we woke up after 8 hours or so feeling all sorts of rested and happy.

My only regret is that we clearly didn't have enough acid to take off on the experience completely. I had bought what I thought were 2 tabs of 200ug doses but 200ug should have put us in a totally different head space. This was more like 80-100ug happy mind land. It was only after 6 hours in that we took the Moxy that I was able to declare the words "Baby, I just need you to confirm that the universe is bending a little bit... I'm fine with it, I just want to make sure it's not just me."

The good news was all of the drugs got along with each other just fine. I was a little worried about mixing a high dose of Moxy with the acid but with the acid running at low volume all night it worked out well. The Moxy, at the large dose, following up the last MDMA roll, left me with a really pleasant body buzzing happiness thing going until I fell asleep.

Anyway, we all know Candy-Flipping is fun, just thought I would confirm it to all my nasty little friends out there in the virtual world and confirm that adding some Moxy to the mix does not, at least for us, cause people to fall over and die. Next adventure will be twice as much acid, some MDA and then Moxy or 2CB as needed for visual additions.

Happy Tripping!

Title: Re: I fantasize about having sex with you people
Post by: DiamondSky on February 18, 2013, 08:43 pm
Quote from: TrashBox on February 18, 2013, 09:43 am
I take it this is the Druggy Moon  8)

What is candy flipping?

Yeah, druggiemoon fun. Candy Flipping is just taking some acid and a couple hours in, once it hits, dropping some MDMA to turn it into a love trip. Ideally you've taken enough LSD to actually get going pretty good as some fairly magical things happen when all of your senses are operating in different dimensions but the brain is chemically locked in on love.

Highly recommended if you haven't tried it yet but I would suggest taking LSD on it's own at least once to fully appreciate it before you add MDMA into the equation. You can have some amazing times on LSD alone but the trip can go to a lot of different places, MDMA just helps point it towards love.

~ Men with a small dick will say they have some special function... "it's curved", "I have a hurricane tongue", "I'll make you come 200x", "it's vein-y and ribbed", "I last ALL NIGHT", etc. These are all actually great excuses (I'll take 200 orgasms over a big dick any day). It's just that, sadly, these are actually just excuses to get in your (my) pants and when dude doesn't deliver it's a BIG DISAPPOINTMENT. For me, a BIG dick can always deliver so.........
~ For some reason, the men that I've ended up in long relationships with have been well-endowed in the dick department. Also,  they are ALL pretty confident, but not arrogant (well, one ex was SUPER arrogant, but I quickly realized I hated him and GTFO)

I guess on a good note, the tip rubs against the vagina wall nice and hard so the stimulation is nice for me.  I had a girlfriend though, who went to her doctor because she was bleeding each time we did it and she didn't know why.  She said it was only with me that it happened.  Other girls say there is no difference though.

As for size, we girls say it don't matter much, but I know it does.  Mine measures at 8.5 and I always wonder how big the guy before me was for the girl I'm with..... . . mmmmmm

Title: Re: I fantasize about having sex with you people
Post by: zipstyle on March 29, 2013, 05:20 pm
Without Further Ado,
The Explicit Review of the TSC Sexy Weekend Kit
Starring: Opium-Hash and TrashBox's SexyTime Playlist

It all began with a package that was stealthily packed...
can you say double-sealed vacuum packaging? Yes, I sure can. Couldn't smell shit til I got through the first seal...and then the lovely spicy earthy smell filled my nostrils. If you've read my review of the opium-hash, then you know about this already.

I had it all prepared; the knives, the stove, little balls of opium-hash ready to go, my half-bottle to catch all the wonderful-tasting vapor when my lady-friend arrived in sexy attire fit for only the sexiest PlayBoy Bunnies. TrashBox, I don't know what you look like, but you might have some competition. Watching her take long inhales of the opium-hash vapor I produced by touching the hot knife to the perfect round putty was arousing on its own. On her exhale, she let her shirt slip off her shoulder, exposing amazing lingerie. I could feel the sexual vibrations emanating from her as I used my iPhone to remote control my computer and turn on TrashBox's SexyTime Playlist.

It was time to get down with the get-down if ya know what I mean ;)

Not to take away from my own skills in the sheets, but she was absolutely drippin after a few hits. I was so rock hard and turned on by my own few hits of this delectable combo that I thought I had taken Viagra by accident. Had my ladyfriend slipped some in my drink? Shit, so high. The opium was just enough to ensure a long-lasting session of bed bangin, something around the two hour mark. Slow and sensual, the way that sensi flows. From time to time, when I came out of my loved-up, stoned-out, opiated stupor long enough, I found myself commenting about the remarkable playlist that came with the kit. Jesus, it's a good thing I wore a condom or I woulda been makin babies all night.

After a few hours of love making with this honey bunny, it was time for sleep. A few more hits of the opium-hash sandwiched between some high quality Spanish bud led me to a wonderful sexy sleep accompanied by my lovely sexytime ladyfriend.

Hope ya enjoyed this sexy review by ZipSyle,
brought to you by the fucking BADASS
The Scurvy Crew.

and that's wussup my niggas.
